description: This file defines the ArxivReader class, which is a specialized reader for fetching documents from the arXiv database based on a user query. It includes methods for synchronous and asynchronous search, utilizing the arxiv package.

classes.name: ArxivReader
classes.description: A reader class for fetching documents from arXiv based on search queries, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous operations.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Performs a synchronous search on arXiv with the given query, returning a list of Document objects.

methods.name: async_read
methods.description: Performs an asynchronous search on arXiv with the given query, returning a list of Document objects.
